name: hierarchy
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a system in which people or things are arranged according to their importance

example.eg: Some monkeys have a very complex social hierarchy.
example.egtrans: 有些猴群中出现了非常复杂的种群等级。

example.eg: He rose quickly through the political hierarchy to become party leader.
example.egtrans: 他的政治地位迅速上升，成了党的领导人。

trans_examp.trans_en: the people in the upper levels of an organization who control it
